page.title: 14MADELEY STAFFS : WORSHIP
page.content: There are 2 places of worship in this section-both Methodist;Madeley Heath Church has 14 members on roll,though more attend services.It has a thriving Sunday School & Bible study group. Anglicans attend All Saints'Parish Church in Great Madeley,with its active Sunday School,Mothers'Union,prayer and Bible study groups. For Catholics,Mass is said in the Village Hall,each Sunday & Holy Day of Obligation by a priest from Knutton who serves Madeley & the adjacent Silver- dale.About 40 people attend Mass.Some prefer to travel to Newcastle or Keele University chapel. There are annual Joint Church services Interdenominational Bible study groups meet monthly.Christian women meet each year to celebrate the Women's World Day of Prayer.Most people are believers even if worship is infrequent.
